mapper.insert:
insert tower_tower_info (Tower_id, Tower_idefined, Tower_name, Tower_who, Tower_area, Tower_address, Tower_level, Tower_fee, Tower_state, Tower_type, Tower_large, Tower_j,Tower_w, Tower_manager,Tower_manager_name, Tower_info, Tower_visible, Tower_is_hb, Tower_add_user, Tower_add_date, Tower_order_id, Tower_img)
values (#{towerid}, #{toweridefined}, #{towername}, #{towerwho}, #{towerarea}, #{toweraddress}, #{towerlevel}, #{towerfee}, #{towerstate}, #{towertype}, #{towerlarge}, #{towerj}, #{towerw}, #{towermanager},#{towermanagername}, #{towerinfo}, #{towervisible}, #{towerhb}, #{toweradduser}, GETDATE(), #{towerorderid}, #{towerimg}) ;
mapper.select:
select t.ID as id, t.Tower_idefined as toweridefined, t.Tower_name as towername, t.Tower_who as towerwho, t.Tower_address as toweraddress, t.Tower_state as towerstate, case t.Tower_state when 0 then '未抢单' when 1 then '已抢单' end as towerstatename, t.Tower_large as towerlarge, t.Tower_fee as towerfee, t.Tower_type as towertype, p.Tower_type_name as towertypename, p.Tower_type_img as towertypeimg, t.Tower_img as towerimg, t.Tower_id as towerid, t.Tower_j as towerj, t.Tower_w as towerw, t.Tower_manager as towermanager, t.Tower_manager_name as towermanagername, CONVERT(varchar, t.Tower_add_date, 120 ) as toweradddate, CONVERT(varchar, t.Tower_visible_time, 120 ) as towervisibletime, t.Tower_visible as towervisible, t.Tower_info as towerinfo, case t.Tower_level when 1 then '一级站址' when 2 then '二级站址' when 3 then '三级站址' when 4 then '四级站址' end as towerlevelname, c.City_name as cityname, c.City_id as cityid, a.area_name as areaname, a.id as areaid from tower_tower_info t left join tower_area a on a.id=t.Tower_area left join tower_city c on a.City_id=c.City_id left join tower_tower_type p on p.ID=t.Tower_type
where 1=1 and t.ID=#{towerid}
mapper.update: update tower_tower_info set Tower_name=#{towername}, Tower_address=#{toweraddress}, Tower_who=#{towerwho}, Tower_fee=#{towerfee}, Tower_manager=#{managerphone}, Tower_manager_name=#{managername}, Tower_type=#{towertype}, Tower_large=#{towerlarge}, Tower_area=#{towerarea}, Tower_level=#{towerlevel}, Tower_info=#{towerinfo}, Tower_j=#{towerj}, Tower_w=#{towerw}, Tower_idefined=#{toweridefined} where ID=#{id} ;
mapper.select: select ID as id, Tower_type_name as towertypename, Tower_type_img as towertypeimg from tower_tower_type ;

select t.Tower_area as area, c.City_id as city from tower_tower_info t left join tower_area a on a.ID=t.Tower_area left join tower_city c on c.City_id=a.City_id where 1=1 and t.ID=(select Tower_id from tower_order_detail where ID=#{orderid}) ;
